comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

It's a great game at first, but it takes so long to upgrade or save money or anything that you end up spending a lot of your real life money. Plus the surgeries all start to be the exact same, and the glitches... oh, the glitches. Zapped $200,000 out of my bank, and that bloody epinephrine shot is impossible to get without striking out. Oh, and $120,000 for research that will only make you $4,000? Why is everything so time and resource consuming???

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

comments: Great fun game. Only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because you go through your money pretty quick buying boosts to win levels to then upgrade your garden. I like the game a lot. Also I think that at the end of your board if you have undetonated items they should detonate at the end of that level. I've lost too many levels because of not getting one item that was next to something that was undetonated.

I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

I love home scape but it can be quite spendy. Both games are fun.  Love graphics animation laughter now free gifts.  Gardens cape is even more fun doesn't get boring like home scape when pay to win is obvious.  Gardens scape takes 1 or 2 coins with easier quests.   Still favorite.  Home scapes got greedy please return again where its not pay to win.  At times we need a color no bonus and lose because home scape didn't offer the color.  Spending hundreds on home scape so thinking of my budget and returning to garden scape.  Gardens cape started it all. Please lower prices

Either make the puzzles easier or give more Passes to actually be able to pass the level ....make it easier to get to other rooms, too many attention to details..also so many tokens should be able to buy a few stars... I've been on the same room level since I started playing and way past level 100. Starting to get bored at this point.

Much has improved since my original review (see below). There are special events going on quite often to help with earning coins and powerups, and the levels don't seem to be as tedious. Keep it up, guys!   "I love this game but the levels are often too hard to beat without power-up help, and it takes so long to earn coins. Most of my friends have quit playing"

The reward for finishing a puzzle is around 50 to 60 coins. It cost 900 coins for 5 extra turns, and 1200 for the next. It has taken me up to 3 weeks playing all my lives as much as possible to finish 1 puzzle. This game is designed to frustrate you into spending money so you can complete the puzzles. Which I wouldn't mind if it was rewarded more fairly. Play Monsterbusters, it is by far more fun, you earn better rewards, and you can buy new lives and power-ups with your coins at a much more fair rate.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com

comments: I don't write reviews on games , but this one is impressive. Once I tweaked the settings the graphics became amazing, love that there is NO wait time for upgrades ! You buy it, you own it . Big advantage.. And you dont HAVE to go platinum to enjoy this game, but I am considering it ! GREAT JOB !!

It has a good game play as well as millions of adds which eventually ruines the game. You have to watch an add after every single mission and before starting a new mission to gain energy. So basically the energy bar is just a little trick played on us for watching advertisement. I will not recommend this game only because of the adds, otherwise it's really a good game.

Do not buy Premium. You see all the locked features saying exclusive to Premium. You drop $70 for Premium only to find out the best features are still locked because now there is Premium Plus for ANOTHER $150. You are not told other than here by me that what you get when you buy Premium is a Premium-lite. You hear about Premium Plus for the first time after you have bought Premium (lite)

I do liken the game. Here are my pros and cons. Great graphics, wide variety of levels, and ease of controls.  Weapons are too expensive, the game stays one step ahead of you as far as when it offers you deals on weapons. You will either not have the points or coins to purchase and then when you do it offers one level too high at your point in the game to purchase.

Nice game. So far I've noticed only critical hits count. Taking out a knee or a shot to the gonads usually fails. Upgrades are like any other game, spend money to get the good stuff. Hopefully it doesn't get to the point I can't unlock the items to keep playing.

Sinse last update when playing when get killed it will show score screen but spawning back to game locks up and won't play just have to watch myself lose or stop and start over losing my life??????? comments: Ads after ever single try, even if you only play for 5 seconds before you die. If you're trying to complete a challenge, every couple tries it will reset to free play mode and you have to go intentionally kill yourself which sometimes takes way too long. Then if you don't tap the challenge button exactly right, you have to free play again. Then every time you get back into the challenge screen, you have to scroll all the way through every one you've completed. The game would be fun if it wasn't so infuriating.

I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

What I couldn't even get taken to dinner before being forcibly bent over with ads? I mean with in 45 seconds; I downloaded, opened, played 2 games, and BAM! There it is. What, you couldn't even butter a brotha up? Hell I'd even been fine being lathered up with 10 minutes. Soo ok, I bite, i watch the ad. Attempt number 3 is going well l, bam I die. Tap to continue, well there's a 5 second cool down for revive I didn't notice at first. So I think to myself "well that's probably what I watched the ad for." Wait the cool down, tap to continue. So I tapped, and BAM! ANOTHER AD. Hmm welp you wanted a rating and here it is. Give me about 5 minutes of gameplay before two back to back ads and I might consider having the game installed longer.

DO NOT PAY TO GET RID OF ADS!! IT'S A SCAM...IVE PAID AND IT DID NOT WORK. EMAILED THEM TWICE NOW OVER A MONTH. NO RESPONSE AFTER THOSE ATTEMPTS. Great game but deliver to customers when they give you money VOODOO. And a simple email would be nice jeez

If you're a sucker like me then you paid the $2 something to remove the ads. Doesn't work, obviously a scam. Helpful Hint: If you play with data and Wi-Fi off the ads actually disappear regardless of whether you paid to have them gone or not. Although this shouldn't have to be necessary it's the only way you're gonna enjoy this game as there is and ad Every. Single. Time. You. Die.

Paid to have add removed, no add were removed! Reading though the comments it's seems like I'm not the only one who feels this way. Bit of a shame as I wanted to like this game but it makes it impossible to tolerate for more than a couple of goes as the add pop up every time still!!

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
recentChanges: - added the save function
- updated difficulties of levels
- added description of stalemate
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: Oh my gosh. This game is one of the best. It literally like a normal school. You jave schedules. You can do ballet class, hip hop class, latina class and finally jazz class. You can go to diffrent places to get outfit,makeup and hair done. They actually give you a report card with all your classsess and grade. You can peform in front of an audience and you can battle people at the battle arena. Finally my favorite part of this game BOY DRAMA AND GIRL DRAMA it's amazing. DOWNLOAD THIS GAME RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!!

I love the quality of the game. Great time killer.Brings out my inner Ballerina lol. Easy, Fun.Game The only thing so far i dont like is wadrobe. For example If your swiching btwn classess its hard to complety take off i.e jacket, tights or pants from previous classes. If u pick certain outfits there stuck on you. Please fix. Other then that good game.

I'm not much of a dance gamer but I love simulation games. This one in particular is very innovative with their design and gameplay. I was skeptical of how I was going to like it at first but it proved me wrong and I immediately took to it. The controls are easy to learn and I don't even mind all of the ads. Honestly, a really great game.

I love this game! It is really fun and if you like dancing then this is the one for you! Personally I like gymnastics more but that's because I've come a long way in it. The only thing that you could change is the amount of ads are! There are so many of them! But over all this game is great! 😉😉

Honestly, one of the best games that I ever played. Dont care much for the ads. Just turn off your data and none of the ads will come out😉 But just like what the other reviewers are saying, the option to choose and take off certain clothes are limited. But other than that, great game.

This game is actually good. The biggest downside is that there's A LOT OF ADVERTISEMENT to watch during playing. I know this is a free game, but c'mon! Waiting and watching minutes of the advertisement is longer than playing the game itself. Not to mention the conversation between characters in the game also took too long to wait and there's some things need to use real money before it can be explored.  This kind of game supposed to be fun and gives the cha cha feeling, but instead I get frustrated of waiting for the advertisement to finish before I can continue playing.  Out of all that, this game is great.
description: Ever dreamed of dancing on stage, spotlight on you, crowd going wild? Now’s your moment to step up and compete – you’re a rising star! You've been accepted to step up, compete and just dance in the exclusive Fame Dance School. Enjoy your dance classes! In this dance school simulation game, step up and impress your tough teachers. Will you go for ballet dance or hip hop dance? Either way, you’ve gotta just dance your heart out in the dance studio. Choose your dance classes and master new moves in ballet dance, hip hop dance, jazz and Latin dance. But there’s drama off-stage too…Sam, the hottest guy at dance school, has eyes on you. Sounds perfect, huh? But no - he has a girlfriend, the cold-hearted (but great dancer) Victoria. She’ll compete with you to make your life a living hell, so watch out! Ready for a dance battle? Who will step up and compete to get the lead part and be the ultimate rising star? Just dance in your hip hop dance classes and more and hope for the best. Who will it be?This rising star simulation game is full of cliffhangers that will keep you coming back for more!Features:> Make your own dance school choices in this dance studio simulation game - become a rising star!> Which dance classes do you want to take? Pick from ballet dance, hip hop dance, and more – set your own dance studio schedule > Advance to the next level of dance classes by completing simulation game tasks and dance battles> Rock your audition! Just dance and repeat your teacher’s moves> Being a ballerina is hard work - practice your plies, pirouettes, and ballet dance moves in the dance studio!> Pick out a killer dance outfit before you compete in your big performance!> It’s dance battle time – step up and show off your hip hop dance skills in the ultimate dance battle! > Lift weights, hula hoop, and bike at the gym> You’ve mastered your jazz technique - show off that fancy footwork in the dance studio!> Show everyone that you're a versatile dancer – just dance and amaze them with your Latin dance and ballet dance moves.>> Uh oh, you're caught in a love triangle. comments: I've love playing this game since I began. The main issue I have is that when you buy a new device to play on, none of your progress is saved and you have to starts back at the very beginning. I had more than 80% of the venues open, over 1.2M coins,  and nearly 100 gems. I bought a new phone and nothing was saved. That sucks! Can someone respond, find a way to save your progress so if you switch devices to play on,  you won't lose what you've gained and maybe return my earnings!

The game is awesome, as for the loyal players like myself your game isn't fair with the diamonds on the casino spin 😢 I play everyday at least 8hr or more and only receive 15 gems every two days or so. Please try to rectify the situation I have never received double or triple diamonds on a spin and I've been playing for a year or so. Why?????

UPDATE 4 the NEW BUILDINGS PLSSSsss? TY... Cant Wait. Hope its coming real real soon and REALLY hope theres MORE to come after. U HAVE A WINNER GAME HERE. i bought ALOT of games, & this one is on the top 5 list. Keep up the great work guys/gals. Awaiting the new buildings. lol.    :-)   TY

This game is good and addicting it just sucks with the fact you need to use gems from everything. I wish it was more things to use just money for. I have all this money and run through gems quick and it takes too long to obtain so I end up not playing for a while. A good way of doing this is through earnings that you collect from your restaurant. You can receive 1 gem

Game is very fun and addictive. But you shouldn't have to spend few hundred dollars to play through the game and play all of the restaurants. Yes you can earn gems for free but would take an insane amount of time with each restaurant requiring more and more for each upgrade as you go on.

There's no way to contact customer service for this game. I just bought the new restaurant with the noodles and duck and my sauce cooker doesn't work. I swipe it and swipe it and nothing. I'm doing it the way the tutorial showed but mine doesn't work. I might get lucky and it will come on but I'm losing all of my customers. I think they need to change it so we just have to tap it. I hoping they'll see this so they can work out the glitches for this new restaurant.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

I'm a woman in real life and want to play one online too!!! When are you all going to add women characters???

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. This was the top shooting game in my opinion, but turning it into a pay to compete killed the fun with this game. Havent been match fairly against players in a couple weeks now. I would recommend trying a different p vs p shooting game.

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

One of the best fps I've played. Graphics is cartoonish but fun, Remedy is underpowered in the sense that it doesn't generate a decent HP on each hit. On lower levels, it's decent but on higher levels against Porcupine, Ranger, Thunder it doesn't stand a chance that could be balanced out by either increasing the rate of fire or increased health generation on each hit , Lifestealer is pretty darn awesome but could do better with a bit smaller crosshair and little bit more accuracy

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings — enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode — use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

Feed it, clean it, play with it and watch it grow up while leveling up and unlocking different wallpapers and outfits to satisfy your unique taste. What is a difference if I buy better worker or he evolve? Maybe to include waiting for raw material after order? Include different sizes of workshops? I have some other ideas as well

This game is really well done. The tutorial teaches you everything you need to know. Its an amazing game and its very fun for killing time. As a machinist my self I like the aspects it puts into play. So good job to the developers its a great game.

What you see is it. Very simple game. Very simple practice. Just s classic build up your base, buy more expensive stuff to make you more money. I don't recommend to download it because of gameplay but because of it's amazing sound track. I LOVE LOVE the techno one that has a very short guitar rift in there. It's music is probably the best for a mobile game and definitely worthy of being a big mainstream soundtrack.  I read some of the reviews. A lot of these people probably aren't smart enough to pour piss out of a boot let alone operate their phone. There is a simple tutorial and even then it's easy to operate. It's not hard to make money like some people it is. Don't spend all your money at once, dumbass.

Irony, factory efficiency game with no automation, zero, none. If you want automation pay $$$. If you want more in game coins pay $$$ so if you cant afford automation and you cant afford currency games done for you. Cant make your own premium currency without paying either. Just a free demo app at this point.

description: You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!
descriptionHTML:
You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!
Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.
Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!
developerAddress: Russia, Penza, Titova street, 9
recentChanges: Performance and stability of the application have been increased.
Minor bug fixes.
summary: You will be able to manage a large industrial enterprise.

I thought this games was amazing. Spent a ton of money and it was fun. Then one night, after putting up a 24 hour shield, I was zeroed. Requested IGG look into it and requested reimbursement. Unfortunate that their glitches cause so many issues. They have so many glitches that they cannot find any abnormalities in my 24 hour shield dropping after 6 hours...  will not spend another dime on this game, and I do not believe anyone else should either

This game needs balance. Seems like all one does is hide behind shields and gather resources and hope higher might players harvest you for your resources. There should be a limit on how weak a higher might player can attack. An individual with over 100 million might should not be attacking someone with only 10 or 20 million. This game isnt a war game, its all about hiding behind a shield and being a resource collection for pay to win players

descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 120 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆
Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!
☆ Powerful Heroes ☆
Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
☆ Master Your Strategy ☆
How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!
☆ Animated Battles ☆
Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!
☆ Choose Your Path ☆
Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?
☆ Summon Familiars ☆
Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. With their powers by your side, nothing can stand in your way!

Write your own legacy, only in LORDS MOBILE!

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile
Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.

comments: EA please keep improving, i already in love playing this game until i realized that i had to spend a lot amount of money to upgrade my team and collecting great cards.. actually im not feeling good at this because i'm not a rich guy that could paid all those packs with very high price.. im saying this to represent all f2p players out there, although im not so f2p at all. i only spent a dollar to buy that eoe pass and nothing again until now. so please, give a chance for f2p player to keep playing this game with no jealousy with those high overall p2p players.. thanks

Be careful on this game, its possible to spend real money and get absolutely nothing in return! For example I bought a Saint Patrick pack, 1000 gems a pack and got 10 lucky leafs, I could use the lucky to buy another pack, which I got a lucky leafs from, so I spent 10 lucky leafs got 1 lucky leaf that I couldnt use  unless I brought more! Literally got nothing for my money. This is EAs way of mugging people.

Please add more sounds effect on this game, and fix the sfx that already on this app. I hope you add full match online like the other game (90 minutes) so we just not attack but defends too. Replay button must be great, and i have idea that you guys add event like "best goal of the week" or so, from that replay, we can save, and send to you, and you can choose who will win it. I think it will make people playing this game. Commentator should be great too if you add full match versus online. I love this game, please read it. Egy Maulana V plays for Lechia Gdańsk now. Add it! Add to all of your fifa games. That replay button should be great

I just saved up all my team hero points, watched a heap of ads so I could build up stamina so I could do my best to try to get Mané in team heroes. About half way through collecting my hero rewards, the rewards pages started to go blank, and the last 25 packs I opened were empty. Is there any way to correct this?

The game is good but it could be better. Elite players are too expensive  so it's hard to upgrade team. Informs and special cards are all untradable so unless you get lucky in events you won't get a chance to play with them. The new layout is better though. Unless you have plenty of time or money don't expect to progress in this game all that quickly. Mobile games should not be as grindy as console games.

What's wrong with this game. I was playing Vs mode and was in world class level and got more then 600000 fans.and now I saw I'm in pro level.how it could be automaticy.fix it pls what the hell is going on.i make my progress playing v hard and all gone with in movement.even I did not play and lose.
description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. ATTACK TO WINTake on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round. KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTSStay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLDParticipate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/enVisit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

recentChanges: This mid-season update introduces an abundance of gameplay improvements to continue delivering the quality of experiences you demand, including:
- All-new Squad Building Challenges, rolling out weekly
- Enhanced Leagues with improved ability to search, auto-join, and updated social features
- Full Winter Transfer roster updates complete
We’ve also made some off-the-pitch enhancements to keep your game going strong. Thanks for playing!
summary: Get a free Ronaldo item and build your Ultimate Team to attack, score, and win!
title: FIFA Soccer

comments: The makers of this game have put their soul into it, bringing into life every element of the game. The characters are charming and beguiling. I'm in love with princess. 😁 It's the only game where I've invested real cash, and have received  its full worth. The game is an epic. I love it. Cons: Although I've purchased gems, and bought legendary chests, I've only received relatively less efficient cards like lava hound and graveyard which help in game play only if complemented with other cards. It's a bummer. I think they want me to spend more to enjoy more desirable cards.

I don't think I need to 'review' much here. There are some points I definitely don't like about the game. Such as the matchmaking... You get matched with the same deck type in a row. Other than that and some minor flaws it's a great game. I love the competitive aspect about it.  Finally I would suggest some 2v2 with different game modes, such as ramp up 2v2. Also, add the rematch button in 2v2 challenges with random mates.  Hope I hit the 4,3k this season. Good luck to all clashers!

I think Clash Royale is a great game to play and is very well put together for all ages, it is a fast paced game and at the same time can be played with an individual pace of your own to a degree being that there is a clock ticking, also new characters are released at a well balanced rate, so that the game doesn't become boring and the regular balance of the characters strengths and weaknesses are balanced to make the game more competitive. I recommend this game for all ages and abilities. It's great for a few minutes or an hour or so and this game also has several different tournaments you can enjoy yourself or with a friend or a teammate. See you soon on Clash Royale. A.K.A. Dad.

Supercell, I think your best game is hay day. Clash royale on the other hand isn't one of your better games. Android is better than apple. Why would you ever support apple instead of android. You released Brawl Stars only for apple. You should have less medieval/fantasy games unless you make the knights, princes etc. More realistic. In my opinion I think you're better at making farm and army games. Please make more of those😖

This is the only game of its kind. Many companies try to copy, but this is the original and the best. There are  endless possibilities of card combos and decks that you could use making the game always entertaining. My only complaint is that the trainer is way too easy to beat. It is one of few games that you could get competitive without using your own 💰. I also like how the stuff that u unlock in the beginning does not go to waste later in the game.

What do we do?  I have been playing this game from 9 months now. In these 9 months i got 3 Legendary Cards 2 from chest and 1 from Clan Chest. But the thing is that all of them were Ice Wizard. I'm in Arena 9 from 2 months now Because i dont have the cards to win. I check the tv royale every time i open the Game for a good deck But. So Supercell tell me what do i do? I can't push to Hog Mountain then what do i do in this game? Please do something

descriptionHTML:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community
● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel
● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV Royale


Support
Are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or http://supr.cl/ClashRoyaleForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

comments: good way to teach us to be patient should we prefer to play freely.   Occasionally error.  KING, to make this game more enjoyable, .wld you pls kindly give us PIGGY BANK freely so we can still collect and use our gold? .pls give brief explanation on new things we're abt to encounter, e.g: HOW TO PLAY, the use of NEW THINGS.  thanks KING, jia you

I just completed all 3185 rounds... took nearly 2 years to do so. A couple of suggestions...  1. Some big reward must be given to the one who completes all the rounds... an uphill task. 2. All these years I played the spin wheel every day ... but not even once the jackpot was opened... it simply shows the malintentions of the programmers who programmed it as such. 3. Boosters must be given more often.

Bright, colorful, addictive game play. Adorably happy graphics. Love "Mr. Encouragement", who exclaims "sweet!", & "delicious!" in his baritone voice. The music isn't my favorite, I find it somewhat creepy. Greatful for the music mute button.  Thank you Development Crew for a fantastic, free app which I have been playing for years! One suggestion: make it clear $3 gets you one-time access to your piggy bank only. Thanks😄

I love this game but level 3166 is impossible! Once you take out one licorice another drops....you need to rethink that level, because it's a level that will make people stop playing.... doesn't matter what boosters you use the licorice keeps dropping and you can NEVER clear all the jelly!

Played over 3100 levels and one thing that keeps happening to me is that my power ups keep disappearing! Over and over and over again. And one more thing, Can you explain why I have to wait over 2800 minutes for my next life? It's been 3 days and it went from 2800 minutes to 2300 minutes! Based on your stupid calculations each day is equal to 170 minutes? Give me your supports group email add and I will send you a screenshot!

entertains well. but plz try to improve the swiping feature ncz when we want to play the first or second episode ,have to swipe all over down n got fed up with that, its taking too much time to do so. its really urgent to improve that thing.

comments: A good time waster, not hard but hard enough to get the old brain working. For once the ads don't bother me because I simply turn my wifi off while I'm playing.
Don't download!It's probably a good game but I can't even play it because there's nonstop ads popping up.If you close the ad another one pops up split seconds later😠😠😠
Don't download just gives you to many ads to the point where I can't even play it, cause I can't see the screen take away the ads and I will consider downloading it again
I really love this game, it makes you think and analyze. It's a way to get you distracted.
It's eases the mind and makes you want to keep playing I just hate the download new game pop ups.
The game itself is addictive, but there are so many ads that make me feel annoyed. If the amount of ads is reduced, at least no ads between restarts, this game deserves a 5.
description: One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch. In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!In One Line with One Touch you will find:•  Hundreds of challenging packs. All of them are free•  Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday•  Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?
descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

In One Line with One Touch you will find:
• Hundreds of challenging packs. All of them are free
• Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday
• Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!

Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?
developerAddress: Belarus, Minsk, Chervyakova str 24, 24
recentChanges: Thank you so much for your feedback. Keep it coming!
We’ve fixed some errors that caused problems for a few of you. Thank you for your patience.
We read all of your comments and emails and update the game regularly to make it better for you.
Get the latest improved version of the game!
summary: Daily exercise for your brain. Connect the dots with one line! Fun mind game.
title: 1LINE – One Line with One Touch

comments: Das sind manchmal voll leichte Rätsel, manchmal voll schwere! Das find ich ne gute Abwechslung! Die bei vielen erwähnte Werbung kommt bei mir nicht sehr oft! Also ist es super! Voll cool! 😎 👍 Cool! Cool! Cool! Cool!!!!!!!!!!!! Danke des Spiel ist super!

Hatte beim Ligaspiel gerade folgende Situation: Die Runde war zuende und mein Gegner und ich hatten beide 2 Punkte, also unentschieden. Also wurde die Zeit gemessen, um zu gucken, wer schneller war. Auch bei den Punkten, die wir nicht hatten. Warum? Und wieso kann ich über 100 Sekunden gebraucht haben, wenn ich nur ca. 30 Sekunden Zeit habe? Wo ist der Sinn?

Funktioniert, ist aber katastrophal nervig aufgezogen. Es gibt viele gute Alternativen - im Rahmen von Rätselspielen - sofern man des Englischen mächtig ist. Mir hat diese App sogar Deutsch aufgezwungen, der Rest meines Handys inklusive des Betriebssystems ist auf Englisch
This game is quite difficult when you don't speak more than maybe 5 words of German....
Macht Spaß und man lernt was auch
Manchmal geht's RubbeldieKatz,dann wieder schwer am Denken.Toller Mix.Super !!!👍

comments: Γαμω το Χριστο σας μπασταρδα παιδια ζηταω εδω και τοσες μερες βοηθεια επειδη εχω να αναφερω ενα bug και με γραφετε στη πουτσα σας πουτανας παιδια, εχω κινηταρα και μου freezeαρει οποτε ριχνω μια βολη, αντε στο διαολο βρωμοπουστες, διαγραψτε το οπως ειναι. FreeFire Battlegrounds is x50 times better and more simply. Go and die in a hole developers.

It has a lot of bugs, but it's a fun game. It has a lot of potential, if you decide to keep on working on it. One major bug that i've noticed is ITEM DOESN'T EXIST. For instance i saw a Scar laying down on the gorund in Military base and when i tried to pick it up it said "item doesn't exist". Fix this please, otherwise, a decent game.

Everything is well put together tmain thing I love is that each area is different from on another like at the school ive had alot of vertical fire fights or power plant or the supermarket. But one thing I think u guys forgot is that the ump 45 takes .45 acp rounds

Controls are terrible. When aiming directly at a player between the crosshairs. Bullets still miss. Terrible game if you're reading this go download rules of survival. That's  what I did. Also sometimes during the middle of a game a loading icon will appear. You won't be able to move or shoot your weapon. You'll pretty much die. When in the safe zone you will still take damage even tho you are in the white circle. To many hackers.

I love this game free fire and this game are my favorite mobile games so far but there should be some changes like you should be able to aim with an iron sight. And the aiming could be better and what I mean by that is aiming is already hard on mobile so I just think stability should be really good without any attachments or like the aiming system on free fire battleground. The graphics are not the best I've seen really just up the graphics a bit and add the ability to aim with a iron sight. Other than those things I love how exciting the game is as well as how close it is to pubg.

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
developerAddress: Unit 04,7/F,Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong
recentChanges: 1. Added vehicle. Motorcycle.
2. When your bullet trajectory is affected by an obstacle, a red dot will appear on the obstacle as a reminder.
3. Added Tactical Aim Equipment. Can be purchased from the Combat Strategy Store.
4. Added Tactical Gas Mask Equipment. Reduce poison damage after use. Can be purchased from the Combat Strategy Store.
5. Added Free Coins feature. View ads through the lobby and receive Gold Coins.
6. Optimized scenery. Added light and shadow effects.
summary: This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!
title: Last Battleground: Survival

comments: So, what makes this one of the best games made?  Let me start by saying the game play is fun.  Try to get the top medal each round. The game on its own is smooth and simple.  Graphic and physics are decent as well. But what makes this the best game?  Ads are not intrusive. You can simply back out of them without the "wait 30 seconds to continue."  I've actually watched ads in this game since they aren't forced. I keep them up because I wanted to.  This does not mean they aren't there or have little countdown timers, but you can simply hit the back button to close it. Next, you don't deal with "you didn't get a perfect score, want to try again? Buy more lives."  Exactly. NO IN APP PURCHASES. None!  Thank you!  Keep playing until your heart is content. Lose all you want and retry. They aren't looking for your money. Trust me, try it and you'll see. You also may find yourself more interested in the ads. I know it surprised me that I was. Every developer can learn from them!

Actually it is much easy and had very less features. It is not like a competitive game. In 2hours I have nearly unlocked 31 levels.  Make it a tough one....graphics is good but lots & lots of ads, very annoying ! And add scores there rather than medals

This is a very fun game, even though the screen freezes almost every time I go directly to the next level. I have to close it completely and then reopen it - Please fix this then I will rate it 5 stars.
Fun playing. Passes some idle time. Habit forming. How much more do I need to say before get something free? Lol...
Meh!!! It not what i expected I'd like to do the training but also the 1 on 1 competition. If any1 know of a pool app. Hit me up.
Great game....way too many ads. I would pay for an ad free version since the ads annoy me so much that I'm going to wind up uninstalling it.

comments: Over the few years of playing I have installed, uninstalled & reinstalled the game all due to frustrations of not being able to complete the higher levels ( usually around the higher 30 lower 40 's )   After spending considerable time, large amounts of the points to purchase all the options offered I am still unable to win, move up in levels due to the set difficulty of the game. I therefore uninstall, only to find myself in no time at all missing the game...the challenge & reinstalling the app.  👍👍👍  Good job to the developers.

I don't like that strong competitive advantages are behind pay walls. These advantages make PVP almost unplayable because of how unfair it is for those who haven't paid real world money for them. Also, one of my fully upgraded non-starter ships was completely reset.

Great game. Would have given it 5 stars but a recent update has made the commercials play at max volume. I play the game in silent mode, in bed, while wife is asleep. Sudden barrage of loud commercials has ruined the experience. It has actually resulted in me playing less and therefore has had me watch less commercials. Go figure.
For some reason all the videos have stopped working. The double coins video, the video for another life and the video to allow an extra spin of the wheel, please fix and I will 100% change my rating

Hard to win PvP when you can't get any power ups. Need to make it more fair. I have no trouble losing a game but when you make it to level 4 and only got 1 power up. Almost impossible to have a chance

Tried multiple times for them to give me my purchase, I have shown them the evidence and they agree I don't have my in game purchase and have been trying to fix it for ten days and won't issue a refund. Horrible customer service

comments: I absolutely love this game but there is definitely a connection problem. I am running this on a s8 so there is no reason, that I can see, for it to run slow and choppy. If the game ran smoother than it would make this a much better experience for me.
All ads from YouTube or Unity ads are fake, none of that happens in game...it's just a ploy to try and get you to download. Game used to be good but now geared to deplete your wallet.
Constantly gets to 90% and fails to load. Didn't start doing it until I had spent hundreds on the game. Messages to the developer get ignored.

Constant connection error when launching game.  WIFI/4G didn't seem to matter, always error at 90%.  Sometimes 20-30 tries to get logged in, but I usually have given up after 10 or so if it isn't working.  I might check it out again once they address the connection issues.

Eating up your money and your time... Do not put or invest any money in this game... When there is an issue no help at all, only requesting screen shots and date and time it happens... But sadly no help at all..
better if it had a build in translation  for all the chats so hard to talk to others as it a world game...

comments: Purchasing the other ponies is worth it. Don't know why other people are complaining. It's only 5 dollars, you could get a DQ lunch for 5 dollars. Anyways, game is amazing. What's cool is that you can reset your progress so you can have fun all over again. Amazing work Budge Studios!

This game is my 5 yr olds favorite thing to do during trips. She loves the music and animation, and the gameplay is entertaining enough to keep her engaged. It's definitely worth the few bucks to get the add free version.

Pay to play mechanic. Seems rather predatory for a game targeted for younger CHILDREN. Not to mention the constant barrage of ads that can only be removed by paying for ponies which shouldn't be EA'd. Outside of that the game is enjoyable but the paywall issue is a problem. Devs... you should feel bad about yourself.

Remove the paywall and just charge for the game, it's worth it and people will buy it. But the way you can't unlock ponies without paying is insulting. Such a shame... I'll be sure to avoid any games you make in the future. And, yes, that's a bit harsh. But if we all don't stop letting devs get away with this kind of thing every company will turn into EA and will ruin the fun of gaming.

Installed it, launched it, after the bungie screen was presented by a full screen ad for some game involving a woman + handcuffs + panties. Not a good look for a game aimed at children, my 6 year old was standing behind me.

Why advertise the game as "free" when it really isn't?  You can only get so far with the "free ponies" before you hit a pay wall that requires parents to purchase additional ponies to finish the quest.  The reason I say "free ponies" is that your child is subjected to a ridiculous amount of ads in order to play. The only way to get rid of the ads is to buy the ponies.  Even though my daughter loves the game and it's easy for a 5 year old to play, I had to uninstall it due to the ad content.  You really should be more careful who you solicit ads from for content designed for children under 8.

comments: Great game, me and the family enjoy it immensely and we have all made our contribution, thank you. The controls in card battles on the phone are too fiddly, considering there is a lot of unused space on the screen: this would have been developed differently if it wasn't attempting to mimic the desktop version. Lazy! Is the ".. playing over WiFi..." warning still relevant? Unlimited mobile data and 4g means many of us have as good a connection as fixed line. Love the game, thank you.

This is an awesome game I play it be very day and I had two games I would always play now I don't even play them at all because this game is so awesome and I kinda play it to much.  But I did get my last account deleted for some reason I was mad and couldn't get it back so I had to create a new one

Everytime I play a club arena game (free every 24hours) it will keep telling me i disconnected from the game while my Internet connection is fine. But when I play other normal arena games, it turns out fine. I find it very annoying because i have to wait 24 hours to play my favourite club games and it always disconnects, and it makes me mad. I hope you notice this comment and leave a reply... Please fix this... Thanks :(  Edit: It works fine now, thank you! :)

Very fun game, my most played game by far but the major issue in this game is hackers. You get good and start to play the end gamers and realize 90% of them are bots with millions of coins and as soon as the game starts you are sent balloons to your side that cannot be activated until round 15+! It's frustrating to earn my coins legit just to have them taken by all the hackers and bots. Ruins the game when makers aren't doing anything about it.

descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.

Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!

Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses.

Check out these awesome features!
* Head-to-head two player Bloons TD
* 27 custom Battles tracks
* 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades
* Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent
* Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses
* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.
* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent
* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time
* Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode
* Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends
* 16 cool achievements to claim
* Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp

If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list.

The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now!

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION

PERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!

comments: I love to play hold em, but it's just to hard to round up the posse for poker night due to simply getting older. Life takes everyone n different directions. Not too mention, having kids and getting married, doing the family thing. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love living the family life with my wife and kids but I will always miss poker night with the fellas. Now that I have stumbled upon WSOP I have been able to invite all of the fellas to join and we can all play together still once again. THANK U!!!!

Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

Win a bit and loose everything in a few hands...  Once you win a good hand, leave the table.  Dealer will not give a a chance.  After this review, I received an e-mail from the designer assuring me, that game is fair.  I have been losing several hands with pocket KK, QQ, JJ, and so for.  So I stand with my original review.   Win on a good hand and leave game.  Or else you will lose it ALL!

This is a good game , only prob I have is there seems to some hackers/botting which makes it a little hard to play. Now as far as some people's comments even if the  people with a billion chips come to smaller tables , if you all knew how to play you wouldn't have to worry about them taking your chips. Trust me the majority of them started out at low tables also having to have to fight the ones with more money. I have been playing this game for a few years and love it.  Like I said only problem I have is to many bots/hackers.

I really enjoy this game .At first I just added it for one of the games on app like to gain points for gift cards.And of course to learn how to play poker. Now if their no points given for this game I would still play it. I totally enjoy this game , and the people that play it. Its truly an enjoyable game. This game is a keeper know matter what.tthe only thing I wish is that their was more coins given .
